subject: Plus X pedal set
description_text:
Hi!  We are very interested in your Plus X pedal set but can't figure out if it is compatible with the Trak Racer TR80s sim rig.  Additionally, if it is compatible, do we need the baseplate or can the pedals be attached directly to the TR80s?  Please advise at your earliest opportunity.

Thank you -
Eric Altman

conversations.body_text: Hi Eric Altman,     I checked the manual, and it seems installation should be possible without the base plate, but since I don’t have this bracket, I haven’t been able to verify it.      https://simracing-pc.de/en/2023/06/04/tr80-lite-racing-simulator-by-trak-racer-review/
